episode_event_halloween_2024/4002_1001_0:
’Ello, ’ello, hola! Ciao and bonjour! Welcome to
the Iono Zone!

Guesswhatguesswhat! Today’s stream is a special
unveiling of my brand-spankin’-new outfit!

Hmmm? Wanna see the whole thing, do ya?
Nyahahaha! All righty then!

Check me out! I’m reachin’ levels of cuteness that
shouldn’t even be possible!

I’mma rock this outfit for my deep dive into some
sweet, spooky content!

All right, listen up! Accordin’ to the scuttlebutt
goin’ around Pasio lately, some weird phenomenon
is afoot!
A creeeeepy shadow is ON THE LOOSE at night!

Folks are sayin’ this shadow’s got a long mane or
feathers or somethin’...
episode_event_halloween_2024/4002_1001_1:
Oh, oh! And get this—some even swear they
heard a scream that’s totally outta this world!

And! So! In today’s Iono Zone, we’re gonna track
down and expose what’s REALLY causing all these
spooky shenanigans! Here we gooooo!
episode_event_halloween_2024/6801_1031_0:
Hmm, I really need a
good hook...
episode_event_halloween_2024/6801_1001_0: Got any cool stories I could use for my next vid?

Let me think... I do have a few ideas I didn’t end
up using for my novels!

How about a story that can curse everyone who
hears about it?
Nope, nope, nope! Can’t spread THAT in my vids!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4003_1001_0:
Well, the thing is, I can’t think of any good ideas
for my next novel...

I joined the Midnight Parade hoping it would spark
some inspiration, but I’m still completely stumped...
You’re in search of something intriguing, correct?

If so, someone over there is investigating a
strange phenomenon—or so I’ve heard.
episode_event_halloween_2024/4004_1001_0:
Hmm... Maybe the cause is something
otherworldly?

If stones are involved in whatever’s going on, I
definitely want them for my collection!

Wow! Everyone’s got a take on this! But what’s
the real dealio?!
Buckle up, buckaroos! We’re divin’ even deeper!
Oh, she must be who Caitlin was talking about...
Eek! It’s Iono! Oh wow, you’re sooooo famous!
I’m Klara! I ALWAYS watch your videos...
episode_event_halloween_2024/4004_1001_1: and I’d absolutely LOVE to help you out!

I used to be a pop singer, y’know.
If we collab...

our cuteness could drive your fans Kla-razy,
don’tcha think? Hee hee!
May I accompany you as well?

(Tsk! Who are YOU? You’re taking the attention
away from ME!)
Sooooo, you both wanna be my assistant, eh?

Hmm, what should I dooo... I don’t want too many
helpers, ya know?

Could you please reconsider? I’d really love to
interview you!

(Ugh, SO annoying! Should I just knock her out
nice and cold?)
episode_event_halloween_2024/4004_1001_2:
Well, I’m actually a writer, and I’m looking for an
idea for my next story!
My name’s Shauntal. Have you heard of me?

Ooooh, yes! You’re, like, a writer AND one of the
Unova Elite Four, yeah?

Yes, exactly! I believe I can be of great help
to you!
Nooo! Wait! Take me with you, too! Pleeease!

I really want to learn how you make everyone
adore you as a Gym Leader!

And I want to be in your videos so more people
know about me!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4004_1001_3:
Hopin’ to ride my coattails to get some time in the
limelight, are ya?
It seems that’s exactly what she planned to do...
I see, I see! Nothing gets past me!
No no no! Please! Let me explain, Iono!

You’ve got a real hunger to stand out, no matter
what...and I love it!

And you! You’re an Elite Four member AND a
writer? Those are solid credentials for a collab
partner!
Mind’s made up! You’re BOTH comin’ with me!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4005_1001_0:
OK, Shauntal! I want you to narrate—and make
sure you lay on the literary vibes thick!
Blimey! Who’re these bra—I mean, kids?
That reaction’s EXACTLY what I was hopin’ for!

Your vibe’s perfect! And those reactions?
Gonna make my vids epic!
Wait, you just want me for my reactions?!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4005_1001_1: I guess that’s fine. Any attention is still attention...

You can say that phrase to someone during the
Midnight Parade to challenge them to a battle.
If you win, your opponents will give you candy!

Wanna battle together and see if we make an
epic team?
Sure! Let’s have an enjoyable battle!
Hah! I’ll do my very best!

We gotta teach these kids how harsh the adult
world can be.
All righty, then! Time for an electrifying battle!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4005_1001_2:
Hah! That’s right! Let my poison drive
you Kla-razy!

Don’t get too serious! They’re children—we should
let them win.
Huh? You want me to go easy on ’em?

Ooooh, committin’ to the bit to keep the fun goin’,
are we?

Look at ya, Shauntal! You’ve got a real knack for
driving viewer engagement!

C’mon, you little ragamuffins! You want some
candy? Then show us what you got!

Here are some sweets to thank you for the battle.
Don’t forget to share them with each other!

Oh no! They took my candy! Whatever will I
do now? Boo-hoo-hoo...
episode_event_halloween_2024/4005_1001_3: Woo! Totally nailed it, you two!

That’s what I’m talkin’ about! We’re gonna make a
great research team!

All righty! Let’s chill till nightfall, then head out on
our spooktacular investigation!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4006_1001_0:
“In the darkness of the cave, the intrepid
investigators could scarcely see the ground
beneath their feet.
“Even so, the team pressed on undeterred.”

Hmm, I gotta admit—this place looks like a ghost
could pop out any second now!
I know, right? And this darkness is SO extra!

“The trio ventured deeper into the cave in search
of the mysterious shadow.

“Suddenly, without any warning, they were
enveloped in a thick shroud of all-consuming
darkness!”
What happened? Why’d it get all pitch black?!
Hmm? Weird. Looks like the light went out.
episode_event_halloween_2024/4006_1001_1:
“As the group advanced deeper into the cave, they
faced numerous challenges.

“Yet with each step forward, they could feel
themselves getting closer to uncovering the truth
behind the strange phenomenon.”

Hot diggity dang! Look how far we’ve come! And
we got SO MUCH footage!
For sure. But my throat is really hoarse now...

A lot of strange things have been happening.
Maybe the reason is...
Froslass senses something... Could it be...
What now? What’s up with Froslass?

Well, you know how some say Froslass was
born from the soul of a woman lost on a
snowy mountain?
What if she’s sensing a lost soul here?

Oh, this could be excellent material for my
next novel!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4006_1001_2: Niiice! I bet it’ll go viral, too!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4007_1001_0: It doesn’t seem to understand what we’re saying.
We gotta take it on with all we got, then!
You betcha! No holdin’ back this time!
OK! Just a bit more to go!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4007_1001_1:
“Could this be the truth behind the mysterious
shadow that emerged on Pasio?! But...what is it?”
episode_event_halloween_2024/4008_1001_0:
Awww! You’re telling me it was a Pokémon
all along?
Not just any ol’ Pokémon though...

In Paldea, some folks have witnessed a Pokémon
called Flutter Mane. It looks a lot like Misdreavus.

Some call it a Paradox Pokémon. There’s still a
buncha stuff we don’t know about ’em, though.

I heard from La Primera that a Paradox Pokémon
had appeared on Pasio before.

Who’d have thunk our mysterious shadow would
be one, too? Not me, that’s for sure!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4008_1001_1: If we reveal the truth, it’s bound to be a hot topic!
That’s why I can’t keep filmin’ it.

It’s true that Flutter Mane is a rare Pokémon.
If I drop a vid about it, it’ll go viral for sure...

But there’s so many things we don’t know about
Paradox Pokémon.

If we start sharing stuff without knowin’ all the
deets, we’d be spreading false info.
And that might end up hurting this li’l pal.
episode_event_halloween_2024/4008_1001_2:
I wanna ask La Primera and the researchers on
Pasio for their takes before introducin’ it in one of
my vids!

Huh... I didn’t realize how much you thought this
stuff through.

Sorry, gals. Didn’t mean for it to go like this after
gettin’ your help.
No, don’t apologize! I understand you perfectly.

I hate endings that leave a bitter taste in
one’s mouth...
I always hope for a good ending!

I think I’m starting to understand what makes you
so popular.

Aww, but now we don’t have any content for
my vid...
episode_event_halloween_2024/4008_1001_3:
Yeah, no one wants a shrug of an ending like,
“Welp! Couldn’t figure it out after all!”
Actually, I have the perfect idea!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4009_1001_0: Brrr! It’s like a freezer in here!
What’s goin’ on? It’s SO cold all of a sudden!

Look! The temperature’s goin’ down, down,
DOWN!

K-Klara?! Did you get possessed by a ghost
or somethin’?
episode_event_halloween_2024/4009_1001_1: Hmmm? I guess folks did report seeing feathers...

and the sleeves of her kimono do kinda look like
them, huh...

Hot diggity dang! Does that mean it was Froslass
all along? Case cracked wide open!

Fun fact! The temperature of Froslass’s breath is
said to be -58 degrees Fahrenheit.

Poor Klara probably caught a cold from the
icy temps!

Anywho! The spooky shenanigans were all thanks
to this Froslass! And with that, we’re signing off!
Your script was amaaazing, too, Shauntal!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4009_1001_2: I’m glad I could be of help!
episode_event_halloween_2024/4010_1001_0: Now that we’re back in the city...
what should I do with this Flutter Mane?

It doesn’t seem to want to leave your side,
does it?

Hmmm... It definitely seems to be gettin’ along
with Mismagius.
D’ya wanna stick around with me?

Let’s get to know each other real good and
deepen our bond...
then I’ll introduce ya to my viewers! Deal?
episode_event_halloween_2024/4010_1001_1:
It seems Iono’s discovered something far more
significant than her videos!

She’s a proper popular Gym Leader, loved by both
people and Pokémon...

I ought to get my act together and better myself to
be like her!

By the bysies, Shauntal, have you come up with
any super cool ideas for your novel?
Yes, I did! I have the perfect subject, too!

I’m thinking of writing an incredible story about
the bond between a streamer who entertains
people all over the world...
and her strong and courageous Pokémon!
